The capital city is Cankuzo. ==Communes== Cankuzo Province is divided into five communes. Each is governed by an elected 25-member council. *Commune of Cankuzo *Commune of Cendajuru *Commune of Gisagara *Commune of Kigamba *Commune of Mishiha ==References== Category:Provinces of Burundi
